mapper.sql: student_id, card_id, fingerprint_id, avatar_id, responsible, telephone, is_delete, create_by, create_at, account_name, account_back, account_number, people_type, tuition, subsidy, subsidy_type, is_refund, residence_type, residence, is_discontinue, discontinue_date, has_certificate, certificate_level, certificate_name, has_training_vouchers, training_vouchers_number, is_new_employees, contract_period, people_name, absent_days, theoretical_mark, practical_mark, certificate_number, fee, sex, has_subsidy, is_ok, is_appraisal, appraisal_type, appraisal_date, appraisal_level, appraisal_number, appraisal_name, appraisal_office
mapper.select:
SELECT t_student_info.student_id,avatar_img,fingerprint_img,card_name,gender,t_student.telephone,email,nation,birthday,education,insured_state,t_class.class_id,t_class_institutions.institutions_id,institutions_name FROM t_student_info LEFT JOIN t_student ON t_student_info.student_id = t_student.student_id LEFT JOIN t_idcard ON t_student_info.card_id = t_idcard.card_id LEFT JOIN t_avatar ON t_student_info.avatar_id = t_avatar.avatar_id LEFT JOIN t_fingerprint ON t_student_info.fingerprint_id = t_fingerprint.fingerprint_id LEFT JOIN t_class_student ON t_class_student.student_id = t_student.student_id LEFT JOIN t_class ON t_class.class_id = t_class_student.class_id LEFT JOIN t_class_institutions ON t_class_institutions.class_id = t_class.class_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions ON t_institutions.institutions_id = t_class_institutions.institutions_id WHERE t_student_info.is_delete = 0 and t_student.is_delete = 0 and t_idcard.is_delete = 0 and t_avatar.is_delete = 0 and t_fingerprint.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.is_delete = 0
limit #{length} offset #{start}

SELECT t_student_info.student_id,avatar_img,fingerprint_img,card_name,gender,t_student.telephone,email,nation,birthday,education,insured_state,t_class.class_id,t_class_institutions.institutions_id,institutions_name FROM t_student_info LEFT JOIN t_student ON t_student_info.student_id = t_student.student_id LEFT JOIN t_idcard ON t_student_info.card_id = t_idcard.card_id LEFT JOIN t_avatar ON t_student_info.avatar_id = t_avatar.avatar_id LEFT JOIN t_fingerprint ON t_student_info.fingerprint_id = t_fingerprint.fingerprint_id LEFT JOIN t_class_student ON t_class_student.student_id = t_student.student_id LEFT JOIN t_class ON t_class.class_id = t_class_student.class_id LEFT JOIN t_class_institutions ON t_class_institutions.class_id = t_class.class_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions ON t_institutions.institutions_id = t_class_institutions.institutions_id WHERE t_student_info.is_delete = 0 and t_student.is_delete = 0 and t_idcard.is_delete = 0 and t_avatar.is_delete = 0 and t_fingerprint.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.is_delete = 0
limit #{length} offset #{start}

SELECT t_student_info.student_id,avatar_img,fingerprint_img,card_name,gender,t_student.telephone,email,nation,birthday,education,insured_state,t_class.class_id,t_class_institutions.institutions_id,institutions_name FROM t_student_info LEFT JOIN t_student ON t_student_info.student_id = t_student.student_id LEFT JOIN t_idcard ON t_student_info.card_id = t_idcard.card_id LEFT JOIN t_avatar ON t_student_info.avatar_id = t_avatar.avatar_id LEFT JOIN t_fingerprint ON t_student_info.fingerprint_id = t_fingerprint.fingerprint_id LEFT JOIN t_class_student ON t_class_student.student_id = t_student.student_id LEFT JOIN t_class ON t_class.class_id = t_class_student.class_id LEFT JOIN t_class_institutions ON t_class_institutions.class_id = t_class.class_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions ON t_institutions.institutions_id = t_class_institutions.institutions_id WHERE t_student_info.is_delete = 0 and t_student.is_delete = 0 and t_idcard.is_delete = 0 and t_avatar.is_delete = 0 and t_fingerprint.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.institutions_name like #{search}
limit #{length} offset #{start}
select count(*) from t_student where is_delete = 0

select count(*) FROM t_student_info LEFT JOIN t_student ON t_student_info.student_id = t_student.student_id LEFT JOIN t_idcard ON t_student_info.card_id = t_idcard.card_id LEFT JOIN t_avatar ON t_student_info.avatar_id = t_avatar.avatar_id LEFT JOIN t_fingerprint ON t_student_info.fingerprint_id = t_fingerprint.fingerprint_id LEFT JOIN t_class_student ON t_class_student.student_id = t_student.student_id LEFT JOIN t_class ON t_class.class_id = t_class_student.class_id LEFT JOIN t_class_institutions ON t_class_institutions.class_id = t_class.class_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions ON t_institutions.institutions_id = t_class_institutions.institutions_id WHERE t_student_info.is_delete = 0 and t_student.is_delete = 0 and t_idcard.is_delete = 0 and t_avatar.is_delete = 0 and t_fingerprint.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.institutions_name like #{search}

update t_student_info
responsible = #{responsible,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

absent_days = #{absentDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},

certificate_number = #{certificateNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},

appraisal_date = #{appraisalDate,jdbcType=DATE},
appraisal_level = #{appraisalLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
appraisal_number = #{appraisalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appraisal_name = #{appraisalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appraisal_office = #{appraisalOffice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fingerprint_id = #{fingerprintId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and avatar_id = #{avatarId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
